patterns: What departments are available in the college?
Which courses does the college offer?
Tell me about the college programs.
responses: Our college offers programs in Arts (B.A.), Science (B.Sc.), and Commerce (B.Com.). Let me know if you need details about a specific course.

patterns: What courses are available in the Arts department?
Which subjects are available in the Arts faculty?
responses: The Arts department offers: Economics, English, Hindi, History, Marathi, Multimedia and Mass Communication (BAMMC), Political Science, Psychology, Sanskrit, Sociology, and Visual Arts.

patterns: What courses are available in the Science department?
responses: The Science department offers: Actuarial Science and Quantitative Finance, Aviation, Biotechnology, Botany, Chemistry, Computer Science, Data Science and Business Analytics, Hospitality and Catering, Information Technology, Mathematics, Microbiology, Pharma Drug Science, Physics, and Zoology.

patterns: What courses are available in the Commerce department?
Which subjects are available in Commerce?
responses: The Commerce department offers: Accountancy, Accounting and Finance (BAF), Bachelor of Sports Management (BSM), Banking and Insurance (BBI), Business Process Management (TCS Patroned), Commerce, Finance and Management Accounting (BFMA), and Management Studies (Previously BMS).
